evidence.claim: Armadillo utilizes AWS for cloud services to manage its healthcare data operations.
The platform supports integration with FHIR and HL7 standards for electronic health data exchange.
EDI and X12 transaction sets are supported for streamlined healthcare billing processes.
Kafka is implemented as a data streaming service for real-time data handling.
Snowflake is used for data storage and analytics within the healthcare application.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or API automation in public resources.
